sourcesContent:
const img1 = require("../images/slider/slide_1.png").default
const img2 = require("../images/slider/slide_2.png").default
const img3 = require("../images/slider/slide_3.png").default

const heroSliderData = [
    {
        title: "Premium Pima Women's Polo",
        description: "description: When it comes to class, it is impossible not to mention the pima fabric line. It creates the best quality for any fashion product. The pima fabric is twice as long and thicker than regular cotton yarn thanks to technology. This makes the structure of the polo shirt strong, durable, minimizes ruffled hair, smooth, colorfast, extremely safe for users' health.",
        img: img1,
        color: "blue",
        path: "/catalog/t-shirt-dinosaur-01"
    },
    {
        title: "Fashionable Women's Polo Modal ",
        description: "Modal women's polo shirt uses high-quality environmentally friendly fabric technology to produce exclusive anti-shrink fabric, modal women's polo shirt is a suitable product for those of you who have a dynamic working environment like today.",
        img: img2,
        path: "/catalog/t-shirt-dinosaur-02",
        color: "pink"
    },
    {
        title: "Coolmax Lacoste Women's Polo",
        description: "Women's polo shirt model is made of coolmax material that feels cool to wear. This coolmax polo shirt design features an ultra-comfortable fit. Creating neatness promises to be a very hot polo shirt in the near future",
        img: img3,
        path: "/catalog/t-shirt-dinosaur-03",
        color: "orange"
    }
]

export default heroSliderData
